entry.title: CZ Studded 925 Sterling Silver Pendant Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Voylla
Type: Necklace Sets
Price: 3199.00

An elegant heart shaped sterling silver set; featuring a dainty chain. Match this pretty ornament with your party wear to add more of edge and oomph in your look!
Caring for your fashion jewelry: We, at Voylla, take care of every piece of jewelry so that you don't spend hours caring for them. But do remember, fashion jewelry lasts longer when kept dry and free of chemicals. Follow this simple rule: Your jewelry should be the last thing you put on and the first thing you take off.
